# Russia

## Overview

Russia is the world's largest country by land area, spanning Eastern Europe and Northern Asia. It covers more than one-eighth of Earth's inhabited land area.

## Key Facts

- **Capital**: Moscow
- **Official Language**: Russian
- **Currency**: Russian Ruble
- **Government**: Federal semi-presidential republic
- **GDP**: $2.2 trillion (2023)

## Geography

Russia spans 11 time zones and features diverse landscapes including tundra, taiga forests, steppes, and mountain ranges. It borders the Arctic Ocean and has extensive coastlines on the Pacific.

## Economy

Russia has a major economy based on natural resources, particularly oil and natural gas. It is one of the world's largest energy exporters and has significant mining and manufacturing sectors.
